s2.title: Questions or Comments
s2.p:
For all questions or comments, email us at:
&XercesPEmailAddress;.
If you are submitting a bug (and bug reports are definitely appreciated!), please provide the following information:

ul.li: Version number and vendor of Perl5 implementation you are using
Which OS platform/version you are using (e.g. NT4+SP4, Win98, Win95)
Which compiler/version you are using (currently, only MCVC++ 6 is supported)
Sample Perl script that causes the bug
Sample XML file that causes the bug
Sample DTD file (if required to recreate the bug)
